item.title: Cascadia Ruby 2013: Tell Us Another Story, Grandpa: Lessons Learned Over 16 Years as a Developer
item.description:
Note: This post is an un-contexualized, un-edited, & un-proofed bunch of notes taken during Cascadia Ruby 2013. See all the notes from this conference.

talk by: Mando Escamilla

“A bosses job is to protect and insulate employees.”

“Do what you like as much as you can.”

“Good employees are like gold.”

“Find a mentor.”

“Apply engineering principals to family and every day life.”

“The worst reason to do something today is because you did it yesterday.”

“Work towards your priority.”
